title: Name suggestions
body:
Hey guys,
love to change my summoner name to another one. Interested in a name that somehow includes both rengar {{champion:107}} and zed {{champion:238}}  (doesn't have to contain 'zed' and 'rengar', e.g. Pridestalker's Shadow, long as the connection is there) as they are my 2 mains. Any suggestions appreciated.
Thanks

replies.body:
NinjaKitty
ShadowStalker
NinjaHunter
NotKhazixNotShen
MetalTooth
Zedgar
Rengzed
IdontBuildAP
YouCantSeeMe
TheAntiKhaShen
The Unseen Pu$$y

> [{quoted}](name=Fitzky,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=P1El8aAE,comment-id=0004,timestamp=2016-04-10T11:46:36.851+0000)
>
> The Unseen Pu$$y

Lmao, this 1's a killer. Will definitely consider this ;)
Well why don't you just use "Pridestalker's Shadow"

> [{quoted}](name=Cankles,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=P1El8aAE,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2016-04-10T08:39:11.553+0000)
>
> Well why don't you just use "Pridestalker's Shadow"

I'd love to, but the cap is 16 characters :/

Tbh Unless you will main Zed and Rengar for a long time, i don't think there is a point in changing your name to something that shows that you main these two champs. You might one day decide to main some other champ. :\

> [{quoted}](name=Cankles,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=P1El8aAE,comment-id=000100000000,timestamp=2016-04-12T08:33:38.859+0000)
>
> Tbh Unless you will main Zed and Rengar for a long time, i don't think there is a point in changing your name to something that shows that you main these two champs. You might one day decide to main some other champ. :\



Nah, been with these two (along with draven) for a long long time, since season 3, but you're kinda right in that a new champ might come out that's more appealing to me.

"Gut Lajneen and stuff him with nails" sounds like a good name to me

Shady Kitten
Dark Kitty
MainsStabbyTabby
Zengar
ButthurtZengar
Tip of a knife
Lion Head
U Fed Now U Ded
Unseen Assassin
UnseensDeadliest 
Rengaring
Kitty Shadow
KittysMask
KittyMask
Zedgar
BooShadowAttack
FoundUNowIKillU
UDED(or UDEAD also)
TheUnseenStalker

as far as im concerned, all of these are available from...*****looks at wrist*****...  5:35pm AEST

> [{quoted}](name=Talon12,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=P1El8aAE,comment-id=000b,timestamp=2016-04-12T07:17:03.046+0000)

Zedgar and Zengar came to my mind, but sound silly imo lol. Atm, 'TheUnseenStalker'' is my preference and i was about to change it to that last night, but pridestalker without the 'pride' just comes out creepy, altogether resulting in what sounds like a psycho teenager stalking his crush D: or do you think otherwise?? 
'U Fed Now U Ded', lmao
TheShadowHunter
Guys, 'From The Shadows', as in both involve just just popping outta nowhere and busting yo face. Can also refer to other assasins (assasin lover here). How does that sound??

I think obscure words are pretty cool. Some google searches led me to Felidae (scientific name for the cat family) and Umbra (a shadow or darkness). Might be worth combining these with some of the other suggestions until you find something you like.

> [{quoted}](name=Nijiiyo,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=P1El8aAE,comment-id=000a,timestamp=2016-04-12T07:15:56.869+0000)
>
> I think obscure words are pretty cool. Some google searches led me to Felidae (scientific name for the cat family) and Umbra (a shadow or darkness). Might be worth combining these with some of the other suggestions until you find something you like.

Umbra would also refer to Noc, whom i used to main. Sounds damn good, but the felidae part.....I'll definitely google this kinda stuff, thanks!
Pridestalker's shadow sounds AMAZING yo!

> [{quoted}](name=Too much rage,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=P1El8aAE,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2016-04-10T09:26:00.977+0000)
>
> Pridestalker's shadow sounds AMAZING yo!

IKR! :( This cap is killing me to be honest, I need to start a petition to increase summoner name characters to max 25 (from 16)

aww that sucks ass :c
try Zed's Pu$$y :D (like another summoner suggested)

> [{quoted}](name=Too much rage,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=P1El8aAE,comment-id=000200000000,timestamp=2016-04-12T06:39:07.125+0000)

Yup :/
Lol, hilarious tbh. Im waiting a few more days until i decide :)

The Jungle's Blade

The Unseen Stalker

The Unseen Jungler

The Unseen Cat

The Silent Cat

Zed's Pussy (i kinda like this one, but its probably a censored word)

Love the suggestions, especially 'The Unseen Stalker'. But maximum cap is 16 characters :/ such a shame
cough remove the spaces cough
Shadow Kitty.

> [{quoted}](name=Vizhad Khaleesi,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=P1El8aAE,comment-id=0005,timestamp=2016-04-10T17:53:48.926+0000)
>
> Shadow Kitty.

Haha, i actually had this in mind, and it's available. But kitty to me sounds bit childish. I'm a main of 2 bad-ass looking assasins, feel like kitty doesn't suit. Thanks though!
shadow kitty isnt available, was in my list but was taken 10 days ago
Silent but deadly

> [{quoted}](name=Essembie,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=P1El8aAE,comment-id=0008,timestamp=2016-04-11T03:09:28.373+0000)

> Silent but deadly

Nice, change the 'but' to 'n' due to character cap. Otherwise, I'll consider this :)
Yoloswagedgelord69
ShadowKatMeow

> [{quoted}](name=andyMak,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=P1El8aAE,comment-id=0006,timestamp=2016-04-11T01:26:36.886+0000)
>
> ShadowKatMeow

Not bad, but i want a name that has an aura of POWER to it

I KNOW
Hunter who lurks in shadows then pops out and uses ult wait is this summoner name too long?
Good Name?

> [{quoted}](name=Epixragequit,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=P1El8aAE,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-04-10T08:11:42.401+0000)
>
> I KNOW
> Hunter who lurks in shadows then pops out and uses ult wait is this summoner name too long?
> Good Name?

Lol, Nice try buddy. Love the concept of lurking in shadows then using ult as they both do that ;)

'im filth'

seems about right

please dont pick a tryhard assassin 'cool' name. 
just think: if someone asks me what my league name is in real life, am i ok with saying this?
